'''Minecraft MakeCode''' is a version of Microsoft MakeCode designed for {{el|Education}}. It serves primarily as an educational tool, used to taught programming in Blocks,{{fn|A {{w|Visual programming language|block-based}} programming language}} {{w|Python}} and {{w|JavaScript}}.<ref name=:0>{{cite|url=https://minecraft.makecode.com/|title=Microsoft MakeCode for Microsoft}}</ref>

Minecraft MakeCode also offers subject kits, including a computer science kit.<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/makecode/teach/minecraft|title=Minecraft Educator}}</ref>

Minecraft MakeCode provides several tutorials, ranging from [[position]] and [[building]], to programming with the [[agent]] and making [[mini games]], with additional videos, projects and extensions being able to be watched, saved and imported.<ref name=:0/>
